ValidationRule.description: Milestones required for NB opps stage 5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( contains($Profile.Name, "Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "5 - Sales Closed Won"), Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c),
OR( O_Customer_agrees_to_contract__c = FALSE, P_Customer_initiated_signing_process__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check milestones O & P to advance to stage 5 Sales Closed
